EmailTemplate.subject: Have you considered automation?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/product-3/why-turbonomic]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
There is enormous complexity associated with running workloads on-premises and in the cloud. Without the right tools, it is nearly impossible for IT teams to achieve a state in which performance is assured while costs remain low, and continuous compliance is ensured. Turbonomic can help.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/product-3/why-turbonomic/]]>
Your cloud strategy needs a hybrid cloud management platform that makes the right decisions in real time for any workload on any infrastructure, anywhere, and at any time. Learn more about how we can help <[[https://turbonomic.com/product-3/why-turbonomic/]]>.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
